banner.title: Slogan
banner.description: Take control of your finances with ease. Track your spending, set smart goals, and save more every day. Budgeting has never been this simple.

main.step 1: Sign up with your email or phone number.
main.step 2: Create initial account to record his transactions.
main.step 3: You can add transactions and track your account.
main.slider description 1: Simple interface/app that makes it easy to control your cash flows
main.slider description 2: Quick transaction entry - Add all transactions with one click
main.slider description 3: Creation of templates to facilitate and speed up the entry of transactions
main.slider description 4: Ability to control income and expenses of different accounts from one center (or not)
main.plan description: Choose the best plan for your business.
